title: The Ugly Truth
writer: Nicole Eastman, Karen McCullah, Kirsten Smith
short_cast: Katherine Heigl, Gerard Butler, Eric Winter, John Michael Higgins, Bree Turner, Nick Searcy, Kevin Connolly, Cheryl Hines, Bonnie Somerville, Yvette Nicole Brown, Nate Corddry, Noah Matthews
cast: Katherine Heigl, Gerard Butler, Eric Winter, John Michael Higgins, Bree Turner, Nick Searcy, Kevin Connolly, Cheryl Hines, Bonnie Somerville, Yvette Nicole Brown, Nate Corddry, Noah Matthews
genre: Romantic Comedies, US Movies, Comedies, Romantic Movies
desc: A single news producer agrees to take dating advice from her disagreeable colleague. To her surprise, his guidance could actually help her find love.
